headline: Chatterbox: Monday
text: Well, that was rather a wet, windy weekend  I'm hoping you spent it tucked up in bed playing video games, like a sensible person? In which case, tell us what you played and how you got on. I'm still shouting and swearing my way through Trials, but have also ventured back to Dead Space 2 because Prometheus has got me all excited about space monsters again.  How about you?
